Title: Initialize sheet
Description: You need to create a sheet and add 3 variables passed in the method parameters to it

Title: Delete
Description: You need to remove the first element from the list

Title: Copy and Append
Description: You need to copy the contents of the list (list) to another list (newList) and add a new point to it, passed in the method parameter

Title: Sort and search
Description: You need to sort the list and use binary search to find and return the index of the element you are looking for

Title: Return Reverse List
Description: You need to move the contents of the array to the list in reverse order.

Title: Dictionary
Description: You need to create a dictionary and add the passed key and value to it

Title: Convert to List
Description: It is necessary to convert the dictionary to a sheet. The key in the dictionary is the serial number of the line in the list.

Title: Frequent words
Description: We need to return the 5 most frequent words in the text. The text uses only spaces as a separator and all words in lower case.
